title.narrative: Supporting the development of Vietnam's capital market and Public Private Partnership financing framework.

description.narrative: The project is designed to support the development of financial markets in Vietnam through improvements in the policy and regulatory environment for government and corporate bonds facilitating both domestic and international investor participation (including the UK). It will improvd management of the Viability Gap Funding scheme, part of the Memorandum of Understanding between the UK government and Vietnamese Ministry of Finance and create a favourable business climate for companies operating in Vietnam. The Public Private Partnership framework will increase opportunities for UK companies to participate in large infrastructure projects and enhance quality and transparency of those projects.
